Texts.Eng: I'm trying to study this material but I have no radiation protection. Specifically, I would like some ^orange;rad leaf^reset; to ingest. Care to get me some?
Texts.Chs: 我正在尝试研究的这种材料具有辐射，但我没有防辐射服。所以你可以帮我找到一些^orange;拉德草^reset;吗？有了这种植物我才能够进行下一步实验。

Texts.Eng: It never hurts to help! And since you helped me, I'll help you. Here's a ^orange;big bag of pixels^reset;!
Texts.Chs: 因为你帮了我，相等的，我也会给你应得的。这里是^orange;一大袋像素^reset;。
